pages.text:
Refined Iron Chickens are a species of ''alloy'' chickens. While calling it an alloy is a stretch, because the concept of ''refining'' iron by adding something that barely classifies as honey isn't very convincing, it works... Somehow.
Lay Item: Refined Iron Ingots.$(br2)While the iron seems to be ''refined'', you can't use it in place of regular iron.
